article_title: Obama Promises Executive Action on Gov Owned High-Speed Broadband
article_text:
SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

As part of his “State of the Union” preview, President Barack Obama made a video promising executive action on “affordable high-speed broadband for all Americans.”

SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

The president supports allowing cities and towns to build their own government-owned Internet networks, which would require the Federal Communications Commission to strike down state laws.

Follow Pam Key on Twitter @pamkeyNEN
